attributes.action: Ban 4x4s, SUVs and other ridiculously sized vehicles from urban areas
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: They are too big and cause too much pollution to be allowed in urban areas. Surveys have shown that only 4% of 4x4s actually go off road, and they are in general less safe than normal sized cars. They take up far too much space, and should not be allowed, least of all for the "school run"
